title: About that statue.
body:
Everyone want's Nautilus or some other water champion that we can play dropped, what about Urf? He is a Manatee after all.

On another note, they didn't say we get to choose who's dropped. :c

tl;dr: All hail Urf the Manatee.

replies.body:
If we, as a community, manage to trigger that goal we get to vote (in other words 'choose') between Nami, Naut, and Fizz. 

It will be funny in 100 years when people go diving and they see a strange mermaid/fishboy/gigantic scuba robot man in amoungst all the coral.

Yaiamone is correct!

If the reef goal gets unlocked then you get to vote on whether it's Fizz, Nami and Nautilus.
Thank you for the information. Though I am still a little sad that we don't get Urf as a choice, just think of it after whatever wars go on and they find the statue. ;-; Urf! The Manatee king!

It better be Nautilus.

I wanna get {{champion:111}} y
